w:r.w:t: The teacher will teach countries by using TPR, sentence frames, and vocabulary. Students will study these words and phrases:
country, language, food, sport, flag, Korea, United States, Korean, English, fish, hamburgers, soccer, football, This is Korea, I
speak Korean, This is the United States, I speak English, I eat fish, I eat hamburgers, I play soccer, I play football, This is my flag, U.S.
At completion of this lesson, students will be able to:
Recognize, spell, and pronounce the words for countries
Spell and pronounce common associated words
Use sets of words in complete sentences
Word List: country, flag, food, sport, language
